name: ATW Messenger
short_description:
ATW Messenger is a Java Based Desktop Messaging System which utilizes the flexibility of JDBC and MySQL to create a Instant and Retardant Messaging System, which is capable of working like a Chat Messenger as well as a non-presence message system. The messages sent via this software, are stored in a central mysql database and can be retrieved in the future using the software. As the software is programmed using Java, reverse-engineering the software is out of concern. Also, use of Java makes this software cross-platform and be able to handle multiple types of clients.

In the developed world of systems like gTalk and Yahoo Chat, It is pretty much necessary to have own personally deployed chat system within networks which has a few limited known users, to chat with. (Unlimited Users Supported Though)
